creator: aterrestris@gmail.com
text:
When using the FarmWarDeployer on Tomcat 6/7/8, it is now mandatory to specify deployDir and tempDir.

I believe we could make them optional, by giving them default values based on $CATALINA_BASE (host.appBase for deployDir, and $CATALINA_BASE/temp for tempDir).

If accepted, I could work on a patch.
